title: Frontier
description: An Epsilon Sector Novella featuring Amalie.Amalie is the last unmarried girl in Jain’s Ford settlement.Life on a frontier farming planet in the twenty-eighth century has a few complications. The imported Earth animals and plants don’t always interact well with the local ecology, and there’s a shortage of doctors and teachers. The biggest problem though is the fact there are always more male than female colonists arriving from other worlds. Single men outnumber single women by ten to one, and girls are expected to marry at seventeen.Amalie turned seventeen six months ago, and she’s had nineteen perfectly respectable offers of marriage. Everyone is pressuring her to choose a husband, or possibly two of them. When Amalie’s given an unexpected chance of a totally different future, she’s tempted to take it, but then she gets her twentieth offer of marriage and it’s one she can’t possibly refuse.FRONTIER begins with Epsilon Sector 2788 – the short story about Amalie – and continues it to be a full novella.
author: Janet  Edwards
